abilities.name: Raise: Basic

effect.name: Requires Consumable
effect.description:
You must consume an object or a number of smaller objects specified when this flaw is taken in order to use this Ability. The player must keep track of how many of these objects they possess and they must not be an item so easily obtained and stored as to make this flaw meaningless. 
At GM discretion more expensive or difficult to obtain consumables may increase the discount offered from this flaw.

components.Notes: Requires Grunt or Troop level corpse

effect.name: Duration: Rounds
effect.description: Convert Instant and 1 round effects to a longer duration. Instant effects can be triggered once on each of your turns, and have a starting value of 0 rounds

effect.name: Minion: Summon
effect.description:
Create a minion. By default only one copy of the minion can exist at a time. Re-activating this ability when at maximum minions replaces the oldest minion with a new one. When a minion hits 0 hp or its duration expires it disappears, or its body is otherwise rendered unusable.
Create a separate character sheet to keep track of your minion's stats. Its starting characteristics are determined by point buy with 14 points, but otherwise following player rules. See Minion rules.
You pay any xp costs for minion abilities/advancement at a one to one price, and the price of any minion abilities are not affected by any prices or multipliers on this Summon Ability.
Minions may not have this ability.

effect.name: Defense: Hard to Hit
effect.description:
Increases the DC of attack checks against you by 1 for each rank of this effect.
When making opposed defensive rolls, such as via the Defend Action, gain one bonus success instead.
effect.xpCost:
160 xp, doubling for each purchase
EX: 3 Ranks costs (160+320+640)xp

flaws.description:
"The attached class resource pool cannot benefit from any effects that restore class resources, and any class resources that would be restored to it are wasted.
However, the class resource pool instantly refills to full at the end of each combat encounter/scene instead of on short/long rests."
flaws.name: Class Resource: Combat Pool

flaws.description: -2 Successes in social combat for people you meet the first time
flaws.name: Bad with people

flaws.description: -1 successes on speed checks -2 successes on cun checks in hot weather
flaws.name: Hot and Cranky

traits.description: Your character's words or deeds are less likely to spread within the general knowledge of a populace, and are more easily forgotten. Photos, video, scying, divinations, etc are always blurry with you in frame.
traits.name: Social: Forgettable+

abilities.description: Revenant & Regen; 5 round delay. The character is blessed (Cursed?) with immortality. They cannot die by any means known to man, and their body always will regenerate to it's natural state, replacing lost limbs and organs, as well as healing any scars.
abilities.name: Immortal Blood

abilities.description: May shift appearance to a size 1 creature. Dispels when unconscious / sleeping. Character can shape their face, bone structure, features, and skin color to look like any human, or creature. However to mimick a specific person they would have had to have met them.
abilities.name: Shape Change

abilities.description: Absorb the appearance of a character or creature.
abilities.name: Absorb Apperance

abilities.description: Heal target creature for 2d6+RES*2 HP. Overheal. Hurts caster for 2d6 Dark damage. Cannot cast on self. Pleasurable to target. Character transfers their vital ichor into another creature, the process is not entirely sanity, but causes the target great pleasure.
abilities.name: Ichor Injection

abilities.description: Cleanses all status effects, but deals 3d6 dark damage to target. Painful to target. Character commands their ichor infused blood to leave their body and inject into creature, causing great pain and damage to them.
abilities.name: Scouring Ichor Injection

abilities.description: Target creature is resurrected if dead and restores any body parts if missing any, as well as healing for 2d6+RES. Causes target pleasure. Caster takes 3d6 Dark damage. Forces your Ichor infused blood down a creature's throat, might represent what looks like CPR, but much much messier.
abilities.name: Ichor Transfusion

abilities.description: When an adjacent creature that has blood takes slashing or piercing damage may make an attack roll to drink some of their blood. Deals 12 dark damage, with vampirisim, and resorts 1 CR. Spend 2 Succes to deal damage again, and restore 1 CR.
abilities.name: Blood Drain

abilities.description: Deals 1d6+FIT+RES Piercing Slashing or Bludgeoning.  Subtle (1). Duo-Wield. Character's hand, feet, and teeth become deadly natural weapons.
abilities.name: Natural Weapons

abilities.description: Different mutated weapons taking up a arm. These count as natural weapons. May only have one active at a time.
abilities.name: Mutant Arms

subEffects.description: Can change arm to be a variety of non-complicated tools.
subEffects.name: Tool Arm

subEffects.description: Character grows 3 extra fully functional arms.
subEffects.name: Multi Arms

subEffects.description: Deals 1d6+FIT+RES Piercing damage to target, penetrating 5 Pierce DR. Obvious, Degrades Humanity. Character's arm turns into a spear made of bone and keratin, capable of puncturing object and creatures.
subEffects.name: Spear Arm

subEffects.description: Deals 1d6+FIT+RES Slashing damage to all adjacent creatures, excluding Allies. Obvious, Degrades Humanity. Character's arm turns into a scythe blade, with a bone edge, capable of slicing through objects and creatures.
subEffects.name: Blade Arm

subEffects.description: Deals 1d6+FIT+RES Bludgeoning Damage and applies Vulnerable greater to target. Obvious, Degrades Humanity. Character's arm turns into a large bulbus hammer made of muscles and hardend skin.
subEffects.name: Hammer Arm

subEffects.description: Deals 1d6+RES Force damage at a range of 20 squares. Obvious, Degrades Humanity. Character's arm turns into a whip with strange energy at the end, capable of stretching up to 20 meters away. (Counts as a ranged attack despite flavor)
subEffects.name: Shrieker Arm

subEffects.description: Deals 1d6+FIT+RES*2 Acid or Toxic damage, applies Atrophied. Obvious, Degrades Humanity. Character's arm changes into a tendril with a noxious stinger at the end. The physical contact of the stinger does not do signifigant damage, however the venom contained within can be quite potent.
subEffects.name: Venom Arm

subEffects.description: Grants 2 dice to Grappling and 1 Auto-Success. May spend 2 Successes to Seal the target as long as the grapple lasts. Obvious.
subEffects.name: Grasping Arm

abilities.description: Using Ichor to enhance bodily functions and purposes. May only have one active at a time.
abilities.name: Mutant Buffs (Array)

subEffects.description: Increase Fitness by 1, and Grants Haste (3) Speed up (3). Subtle (1). Character's adrenal glands and motor functions efficency increase drastically.
subEffects.name: Enhanced Physical

subEffects.description: Increase Phys DR by 12 and Elemental DR by 12. Obvious. Character's skin hardens and becomes more resistance to most natural damage types.
subEffects.name: Enhanced Skin

subEffects.description: Add 3d6+5 true damage to all attacks. Obvious, Degrades humanity, only usable on Natural Weapons. Natural weapons the Character has gains a terifying unatural glow of eldritch energy, seemingly able to cut through everything and anything.
subEffects.name: Enhanced Damage

subEffects.description: Increases CUN by 2. Subtle (1). Character enhances their socialability and perceptive capabilities by manipulating pheramones and sensory organs.
subEffects.name: Enhanced Cunning

subEffects.description: Grants invisible and increases stealth by 5. Subtle (1)
subEffects.name: Enhanced Stealth

abilities.description: Adapting the body, providing alternate means of movement. May only have one active at a time.
abilities.name: Mutant Movement (Array)

subEffects.description: Increase land movement by RES+1. Subtle (1). Character's leg muscles become extremely efficent and grant increased land speed.
subEffects.name: Athletic Adaptation

subEffects.description: Increase Spider Climb speed by RES, Subtle (1). Character can climb on verticle surfaces and cealings like they were the ground.
subEffects.name: Spider Adaptation

subEffects.description: Increase Swim speed by RES+4. Obvious. Character's hands and feet become webbed, and forearms grow fins to allow easy of movement through liquids.
subEffects.name: Aquatic Adaptation

subEffects.description: Increase Burrow Speed by RES. Subtle (1). Character's body hair is capible of vibrating at a frequency which allows them to move through soft terrain as if it were a liquid.
subEffects.name: Subterranean Adapation

subEffects.description: Increase Flying Speed by RES+1. Obvious, Degrades humanity. Character grows terifying leathery, tendriled, tattered wings, granting the ability to fly.
subEffects.name: Winged Adapation

status.name: Hastened {rank}
status.effect: The creature gains {rank} bonus AP each time it gains AP, and does not affect the total AP storage limit. The creature also gains the rank of Hastened as AP immediately.

status.name: Speed Up {rank}
status.effect: Movement actions are increased by {rank} squares

adjustments.description: Add 3d6+5 true damage to all attacks.

status.name: Invisible
status.effect:
The creature is unable to be easily percieved by sight and may make stealth checks out in the open.
Creatures wishing to attack an invisible target must succeed an opposed Perception Vs Stealth check.

equipment.description: Increases the DC of social checks by 2, Grants Social: Forgettable. Gives 10 Physical DR, and increases AC by 1. Increases DC to identify character by 1. Takes up two Attunment slots. These heavy clothes cover the body from head to toe including a hood. There is an ugly removable mask that is part of the hood to help conceal the identity of the character.
equipment.name: Reinforced Concealing Clothes

equipment.description: Deals 2d6+RES+FIT piercing damage. Custom High-Caliber 6 round revovler, has modified trigger for faster firing.
equipment.name: High Caliber Revolver

flaws.description:
Class Resource: Stagnant Pool
Class Resource: Special Resources
flaws.name: Class Resource Flaw

flaws.description:
Make a RES save when Rage trigger effect occurs, must make save for each occurrence. 0-3 Success : Berserk , 4-6 : Frenzied, 5-9, Irritable, 10+ Act normally. 
Trigger effect; Being; Bound, Confined (In a tight space), restrained, exsanguntatied, or out of CR 
Character has a severe aversion to these triggering effects, where even when threatened with them will try to bargin with the individual, and in some cases may become violent.
Berserk: Apply Enraged and confused status until death.
Frenzied: Apply Enraged for the encounter / scene; At end of encounter make a DC 6 Save to cleanse the status.
Irritable / Impulsive: Character makes attacks a full power only, and is much more easily provoked, requiring a DC 6 save or become taunted by source of irritation.
flaws.name: Blood Rage

flaws.description: Holy Stone to remove Luck: Ill-Fated (200GP)
flaws.name: Ill-Fated (countered)

traits.description: You do not suffer any harmful effect from being exposed to, consuming, or absorbing blood from another creature. (Such as Diseases, Sickness, Parasites, ect.)
traits.name: Universal Recipient

traits.description: Whenever your character attempts a social check with a creature, you may reduce the DC of the check by 2. This is likely a result of the experiments on the character combined with their natural good looks. (Bonus applies to any creatures that are capable of being sexually attracted, even members of same sex.)
traits.name: Social: Extremely Attractive

traits.description: Adds, Nightvision, Enhanced Scent, Enhanced Auditory, Enhanced Vision (Binocular), Thermal Vision, Blood Sense
traits.name: Enhanced Senses
